content: I am not able to accurately predict the future, but drew brees has had a successful career, and it is certainly possible that he could lead the saints to another super bowl victory. however, winning a super bowl is not an easy feat, and it takes a team effort, not just the quarterback's performance, to win the championship. with that said, the new orleans saints have a talented team, and they have a good shot at winning the super bowl in the future, with or without drew brees as their quarterback.
